You know how little baby feet are so perfect and cute? And then we shlup them into narrow, stiff, high soled shoes that just...ruin them? Enter barefoot shoes! I personally think the Vivo barefoot ones are the bestest, but they are also super expensive! And for kids that will outgrow everything in literally the blink of ONE eye, I decided to go the cheaper route and get these. So far, so good. My kid's toes aren't crowded, they go on super easy, and they have this cute dog on the inside heel part, it's halved, and when you put the shoes together the right way the dog is in correct position, so it kind of gives the kids an additional visual so they get the right shoe on the right foot (and the left shoe on the left foot...ahah...okay bad joke).  Lots of sizes and colors, so when he outgrows this pair I will simply purchase another one. When their shoe sizes stabilize, I will probably pursue vivo barefoots, as that is what me and my spouse wear.

Features: These shoes feature a flexible rubber sole, cushioned insoles, and breathable materials. They come with adjustable closures to ensure a secure fit. 评论概述: Great quality shoe for our 4 year old - size 8w
评论详情: We recently got these shoes for our 4-year-old, and they have quickly become a favorite! The quality and durability of these shoes are outstanding. The design is clearly crafted with kids' needs in mind, featuring a super wide toe box that accommodates chunky feet perfectly. This thoughtful design promotes natural toe splay and comfort, which is great for my child's developing feet.  The natural barefoot comfort these shoes provide is impressive. The wide toe box and low drop enhance ground feel and foot flexibility, which are crucial for healthy foot development. My child seems more confident and comfortable while running and playing, thanks to the excellent foot protection and sensory awareness these shoes offer.  One of the best features is the hook and loop straps. The upgraded Velcro is durable and makes it easy for my child to put the shoes on and take them off independently. This feature is fantastic for boosting their sense of autonomy.  The breathable fabrics and comfortable insoles are perfect for all-day wear. Whether it's walking, running, or jumping, these shoes keep my child's feet cool and comfortable throughout the day.  Lastly, the AB dog pattern insoles are a clever touch, helping my child quickly learn to differentiate between the left and right shoes, which makes getting ready a lot easier.  Overall, these shoes are a fantastic investment in both quality and comfort, and I highly recommend them for any parent looking for durable, well-designed footwear for their little ones.

That wouldn’t be a problem except that when I tighten the straps, the strap is so long on the other side that it no longer  makes contact with the other Velcro side if that makes sense. I could probably solve that issue by trimming off an inch of the end of the strap, but that would probably result in it unraveling. Great comfort, flexible sole, color options are great. I just wish the straps have been designed a little bit differently.
